meanings.definition: Able to be flicked or moved quickly with a flick.
meanings.sent1: The light paper airplane was flickable across the room.
meanings.sent2: The switch on the wall was flickable with a quick motion.
meanings.sent3: The flickable feather toy entertained the playful kitten.
meanings.sent4: Her flickable fingers danced gracefully on the piano keys.
meanings.sent5: The flickable button on the remote control made changing channels easy.

meanings.definition: Capable of being easily flicked or flipped.
meanings.sent1: The flickable coin spun in the air before landing on heads.
meanings.sent2: The pages of the book were flickable, making it easy to skim through.
meanings.sent3: The flickable pancake surprised everyone by landing perfectly on the plate.
meanings.sent4: His flickable wrist sent the basketball soaring into the hoop.
meanings.sent5: The flickable light switch brightened the room with a simple touch.

meanings.sent1: The flickable light switch was conveniently placed near the door.
meanings.sent2: The cards in the deck were flickable for a fun game of poker.
meanings.sent3: The flickable lid on the jar made it easy to open and close.
meanings.sent4: Her flickable hair tie kept her hair in place during the workout.
meanings.sent5: The flickable pages of the magazine made it enjoyable to read on the go.
